name: EGG HUNT VR
description:
Description
Egg Hunt VR is the ULTIMATE Easter Egg Hunt VR experience. Wander through realistic environments like forests, the ocean and snowy mountains, looking for Easter eggs! With “Bunny” by your side, he will help you find them if you get stuck. Celebrate Easter by playing today!Key Features
  • Wicker Easter egg basket where you place the eggs you find
  • Interesting environments and challenge
  • Infinite Puzzles (each time you play a level the eggs will be hidden in a different place!)
  • Awesome sidekick, “Bunny”

  • Standing AND Roomscale Gameplay are both supported – HTC Vive is required
